tutorial1.text: We have tail wind boy, file your sails to go full speed ahead towards the Ghost Needle.
Use the rope to starboard to loosen the sails.
Just push the Right Stick up, boy.
I'll keep the Left Stick Rudder pointing at the Ghost Needle...

tutorial2.text: Noticed the change in the water? Still an easy weather.
The Ghost Needle points towards the next memento, the wind is different now.
Just keep your sails in good shape, they should not be flaming.
Aye, more or less... the wind is still good.

tutorial3.text: The wind comes fully from board, the sea is getting rougher. Stay tight!! Hunt the sails towards you.

tutorial4.text: We have unfavorable wind... that can't keep us away from the next memento!
I'll handle the rudder to luff and drift against the wind, going zig-zag, that is.
So I can get the sails full! Aye-aye!

tutorial5.text: We must anticipate the Black Yard's path to intercept it! Hold tight for your dear life!!!
Worry not! It won't get away from us, Captain!!!!

chapter1.text: The first memento, the bottle of poisoned rum that was used to take out the Captain of the Black Yard.
He drank it all, and said "I'm fine"...
...and so they shot him until he was dead.

chapter2.text: The sabotaged weapon of Captain Al.
Who was the port rat that dared to betray my great-great-grand father?
No one knows now, no one remembers scrubs...

chapter3.text: Miguel the Parrot... captain Al's greatest friend.
The second to fall against the traitors.

chapter4.text: Al's favourite food, pollito a la naranja.

chapter5.text: That's it... we've found Captain Alvin's mighty Black Yard.
Alvin D. Infante... the One True King of Pirates.
May the waters help you rest in peace, oh King.
